bike.description: 100% Cro-Mo 20.75" TT frame, formed DT/TT, tig welded, externally relieved integrated head tube, Euro BB, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle

components.description: Cro-Mo, 1 1/8" threadless w/ reinforced steerer, 1.4mm 1 1/4" blades, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle
Cro-Mo 2pc, 620mm width, 195mm rise, 11 degree back, 6 degree up sweep
Tektro FX15, cold forged, linear spring, 15mm offset arms w/ double bushing pivots, grey soft compound cartridge pads
Tektro 275A, forged two finger w/ 2pc clamp, 15mm cable pull
Fuse Euro, alloy cups, 4x cartridge bearings, 19mm heat treated Cro-Mo 8 spline spindle
Sun Rhyno Lite XL DW w/ eyelet (CNC side wall rear only)
Specialized Fuse, alloy compact Flip-side M-30, 36h, sealed 4x bearing, hollow 14mm axle
Owners manual, chainguard, reflectors, 2x heat treated steel axle pegs w/ anti-spin hardware
